arts.ttl: Leeds United transfer latest as Norwich City ace emerges as potential Illan Meslier replacement
arts.sum: Leeds United have been linked with a summer move for Norwich City goalkeeper Angus Gunn. A new shot-stopper is thought to be a priority regardless of whether they achieve promotion or remain in the Championship next season.

arts.ttl: Leeds, Burnley on verge of Prem returns after wins
Leeds United star Manor Solomon makes future point after more promotion race heroics
arts.sum: Manor Solomon has pinpointed his determination to secure promotion to the Premier League with Leeds United after scoring their winning goal against Oxford United. After scoring the winning goal, Solomon went on to deliver a clear promotion message as Leeds prepare to play Stoke City on Easter Monday in their next fixture.

arts.ttl: Gary Rowett singles out two Leeds United stars for praise after Oxford defeat
arts.sum: Rowett told Sky Sports: "The one thing you have to say about Leeds is that you can't switch off for a second. Oxford United head coach Gary Rowett felt his team gave title-chasing Leeds United a real scare tonight.

arts.ttl: Championship roundup: Solomon keeps Leeds top with victory at Oxford
arts.sum: Bristol City and Coventry tighten grip on playoff spots Plymouth stay bottom after injury-time Boro winner Leeds are on the verge of promotion after Manor Solomon’s goal secured a 1-0 victory at Oxford. The win keeps Leeds top of the Championship and five points clear of third-placed Sheffield United with three games remaining. Daniel Farke’s side scored the decisive goal in the first half with Jayden Bogle’s cross finished at the far post by the Tottenham loanee Solomon. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Daniel Farke issues Leeds United reminder as the 'relentless' Whites move closer to promotion
arts.sum: "We missed chances to bury them with the second goal but if you don't bury them you have to show steel and resilience and that's what my lads have shown in this really difficult away task. "We know that not many teams create chances or score goals against them.

arts.ttl: Leeds beat Oxford to reclaim top spot and move closer to promotion
arts.sum: Leeds returned to the top of the Championship and took a huge step towards automatic promotion back to the Premier League with a 1-0 win at Oxford.

arts.ttl: Leeds beat Oxford to reclaim top spot and move closer to promotion
arts.sum: Leeds returned to the top of the Championship and took a huge step towards automatic promotion back to the Premier League with a 1-0 win at Oxford.

arts.ttl: Manor Solomon goal fires Leeds back to top of Championship with win at Oxford
arts.sum: The Israel international arrived at the far post in the 33rd minute to smash Jayden Bogle’s right-wing cross high into the net.

arts.ttl: Chris Wilder fires clear warning to Leeds United and Burnley in promotion race - 'Keep swinging'
arts.sum: With the Blades continuing to chase down the top two - and Burnley to play next on Easter Monday - Wilder added: "We got over that and we go into Monday night with it all to play for, we wanted to go deep into this season and we need to do that with a performance on Monday; energy, personality and belief. Chris Wilder has defiantly vowed that his Sheffield United side will "keep on swinging" after closing the gap on EFL Championship promotion rivals Leeds United and Burnley .
